Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Kildare
ShortDescription: Eastbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Kostner, Ogden, Pulaski and Cermak: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Kildare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Kostner, Ogden, Pulaski, Cermak and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Kildare.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
